Player History
Drafted in 14th round, 219th overall pick, by New York in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/5/2015, off James Stults (SLB)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/10/2015, off Danilo Mota (KC)...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $707,143 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/5/2017 to a 1-year deal worth $600,000 per year...
Injured on 6/1/2017 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/25/2018 to a 1-year deal worth $550,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Brooklyn on 2/15/2019 to a 1-year deal worth $900,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 3/2/2020 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/9/2020 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/27/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $2,540,000 per year...
